Name: Kilufe
Short Character Overview(WIP): Kilfe is a very versatile Character, she can Tank increasing her Hate via Spellblade Sub,Heal via White Mage sub which also grands a light magic attack, or apply Confusion and Stun via Battle Mage sub, additionally she can deal decent amounts of aoe damage and increase the faith of your party.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Support 1: Magic Up Lv.1
Support 2: Defense Up Lv. 1
Reaction: Anti-barrier (Chance of damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Warrior of Light
Short Character Overview(WIP): Warrior of Light is a great Tank with resistances against every damage type except Pierce. He got a teleporting damage skill giving him the opportunity to quickly engage as frontline and maintain his role as enemys focus with his Skill, which increases hate. Which also makes him able to run a different Vision Card other than 'Vow of Love' due to his high amounts of Hate.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Light Warrior
Support 1: Beginning Warrior (Max HP up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Providence of Dark: Magic ATK Res Up, Dark Res Up)
Reaction: Warrior's Pride: 3 turn DEF up when hit by Physical Atk

Name: Rain
Short Character Overview(WIP): Rain is a Magic Tank, with potenial to deal high amounts of Magic damage. His high initial AP allows him to use his LB right at the start of Combat. He can assist your Team with several debuffs and help creating and maintaining high Chains. He's vulnerable to debuffs, becuase he needs high amouts of Faith,which most Tanks usally dont want.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage/ Grandshelt Knight
Support 1: Spirit Up Lv.1 (Spirit Up)
Support 2: Intersifying Power (Magic Up, Enhance skills)
Reaction: Sword Guard: Chance to reduce damage when taking damage

Name: Vinera
Short Character Overview(WIP): Vinera got High mobility.Various debuff skills to reduce defense, very useful for Physical team in Raid and Boss stages. Have defense penetration passive. Really high evasion. Cancer for Arena and PvP
Recommended Build:
Sub: Double Gunner
Support 1: Thief Lore ( Move+1, Agi Up)
Support 2: Tune-up (Agi Up, Def Penetration Up)
Reaction: Dark Shadow (Chance of raising own Evasion Rate for 3 turns when Taking damage (Stackable up to 3 times) & CT Up)

Name: Victora
Short Character Overview(WIP): Victora excels in fast casting long range Jump attacks, with the help of her Master ability. She got good mobility with her Main Job being Dragoon giving her 4 Jump and access to move 1+ from her Thief Sub. Her Abilitly Board and access to the Soldier Sub allow her to reach high atk numbers.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Dragoon
Support 1: Self- Sacrifice (Great ATK Up, All Res Down)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move+1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Dragon's Blade (Chance of Counterattack when taking Damage & absorbs Damage dealt)

Name: Lucia
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lucia is a super strong Gunner that that is easy to use.  Can use Ranger sub skills to attack enemy standing behind Allies. Have Defense penetration passive make her a great Tank killer. Especially effective against Mont as her MA also have Earth Killer
Recommended Build:
Sub: Double Gunner
Support 1: The Secret of Shooting (Missile ATK Up)
Support 2: Tune-up (Agi Up, Defense Penetration Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Miranda
Short Character Overview(WIP): Miranda can reach high Mag numbers with her Ability Board and Master ability, thanks to the Red Mage sub she gets high initial AP from the Board, allowing her to cast her powerful LB right at the start of Combat. She got good support abilitys with Time Mage sub and gets reasonably tanky for a main dps.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Initial AP Up Lv 1 (Initial Ap Up)
Support 2: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Reaction: Slow Counter (Chance of inflicting Slow on target for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Kitone
Short Character Overview(WIP): Kitone is a highly mobile dps unit, she got high base move and jump and can even further increase her mobility with her skills. She can also buff up her patk similar to Sterne which allows high damage spikes. Her biggest issues are her low range and survivability.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ninja
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down)
Reaction: Slow Counter (Chance of inflicting Slow on target for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: "Whisper"
Master Ability Effect:
Slash ATK +5,
All Attack Type Resistance +5
Short Character Overview(WIP): Whisper got 30% res to all attack types and access to Skills raising her Evasion, makeing her able to be played as a Tank type character with the 'Vow of Love' Vision Card equipped, with her main Job being Knight she can apply several debuff. Her HP is really low, but her kit makes her a valueable Magic Tank.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai
Support 1: HP Up Lv.1
Support 2: Blade Soul (ATk/Evasion Up, DEF Down)
Reaction: Third Eye (Chance of raising Evasion Rate for 3 turns when taking Damage (Stackable up to 3 times))

Name: Orlandu
Short Character Overview(WIP): Orlandu can deal high amounts of damage in addition to reduceing the enemys lightning res and defence. He's fairly tanky for main damage dealer allowing him to stay in the battle for much longer, than most other dps Characters.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai
Support 1: Thunder God (Great ATK Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Blade Soul (ATk/Evasion Up, DEF down)
Reaction: Auto-Refresh (Chance of recovering AP when taking Damage)

Name: Ramza
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ramza can buff her own move and jump, being able to quickly roam around the map. She can deal both Magic and Physical damage, which makes her a valueable damage dealer. She can buff her bravery, atk and mag and got access to a 3-hit elemental strike attack allowing her to stack high Chains pretty fast.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Spellblade
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Support 2: Shadow Runner (Agi/Luck Up)
Reaction: Counter Tackle (Chance of counterattack & 1-panel Knockback whan attacked)

Name: Christmas Macherie
Short Character Overview(WIP): Christmas Macherie got various ranged attacks with her Jump abilitys and her high base jump allows her to abuse the map terrain and her ranger sub. She gets high amounts of atk from her ability Board and can be a main dps for boss battles. Her basic attack being melee makes it harder to efficiently abuse her high range without running out of AP.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max Hp/Atk Up)
Support 2: Focus (Cast time Down, Missile Atk Up)
Reaction: Dragon's Blade (Chance of Counterattack when taking Damage & absorbs Damage dealt)

Name: Christmas Ramada
Short Character Overview(WIP): Christmas Ramada simular to Sterne, got Soldier as Main job allowing her to get high amounts of atk and Ninja as Sub for some ranged power, also she got a 3-hit water attack allowing her to stack and maintain high water Chains.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ninja
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down)
Reaction: Counter Slash (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Yerma
Short Character Overview(WIP): Elmas main Job Viking is a very valueable Attacking Job, She got good mobility thanks to the Thief's passive and good durability do to Vikings passive, she's a overall well balanced Character, thats plays well in almost every situation.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Viking
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/ Atk Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of Damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Frederika
Short Character Overview(WIP): Frederika excels in High Range and good mobility, both in addition to each other results that she she can stay out of the enemys range, while killing them with her high range. She got a good amount of debuffs and can use the Ranger sub to make use of the heights advantage on certain map. With her Sniping skill she can counter high evasion units.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunner/ Ranger
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Support 2: Concentration (Range +2, Evasion Down)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Sterne Leonis
Short Character Overview(WIP): Sterne is a very strong attacker, with good mobility. His Ninja sub job, allows him to get move/jump +1 and gives him a ranged skill to kill units from afar. He can reach really high damage numbers, but suffers from low survivability.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ninja 
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1) 
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down) 
Reaction: Counter Slash (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Gilgamesh
Master Ability Effect:
Speed +10%, Slash ATK +10
Level 80: HP +1000, Accuracy +15
Short Character Overview(WIP): Gilgamesh is very versatile, hes tanky, can deal good amounts of damage and additionally got support potential. His unique main Job gives him an aoe attack that reduces Slash resistance and he can use Time mage sub for haste and quicken  and strong Magic attacks. His biggest downside is being SUPER expensive to build, he cost about twice as much as other UR units.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: AP gain Up Lv. 1
Support 2: Speed Cast (Cast Time Down)
Reaction: Clairvoyant Blade (Chance of pre-emptive attack when about to take physical Damage)

Name: Ayaka
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ayaka is the best Support unit in the Game (so far). She got high Agi and start with high amounts of AP, she can cast her LB from the beginning of the stage. She got good heals and her Time mage sub can quicken and haste, additionally she can even deal a good amounts of damage with Comet from her Time mage sub and later on Holy from White Mage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Speed Cast (Cast Time Down)
Support 2: Emerald Echo (Buff/ Debuff cast by self +1 turn)
Reaction: Dispel Counter (Removes all Buffs from enemy when taking Damage)

Name: Mediena
Short Character Overview(WIP): Mediena is the Character with the highest amount of Mag so far. Her high initital AP and the possibitly to use her Diamond aoe LB at the start of the Stage makes her a great farmer. Once properly raised she gets access to 'Flare', a high dmg, none element, single target, magic attack, which gives her great strength for Raids.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage/ Green Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Macherie Hourne
Short Character Overview(WIP): Macherie got high mag and can cast good heals and magic attacks with that. She can buff up light and dark resistance and prevent several debuffs. Her usefullness is highly dependend on the stage and corresponding enemys.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Oelde Leonis
Short Character Overview(WIP): Oelde is a Bruiser type Unit, hes able to deal good amounts of damage close range. His high base stats, MA & mainly LB allow him to perfom decently well a tank. His downsides are low movement in addition to his mainly melee damage spells.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer/ Samurai
Support 1: Blade Soul (ATK/Evasion Rate Up & DEF down)
Support 2: Deadly Mastery (Crit Rate Up)
Reaction: Counter Thrust (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage, Piercing)

Name: Aileen
Short Character Overview(WIP): Aileen is a nice damage dealer, she can reach high atk stats and once fully awakend she gets really strong long range attack. Her LB reduces enemys Earth resistance, futher increaseing the dmg from other earth units in your party. She suffers from low agi and move.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice (Great ATK Up & All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Deadly Mastery (Crit Rate Up)
Reaction: Counter Slash (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Robb Hourne
Short Character Overview(WIP): Robb is a fast Damage dealer, who excels in high Crit and Evasion, he got good AP management, which is nice for long fights and is overall a really 'easy to use' dps. He got low movement and tankyess, which makes him less appealing than other dps units
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer/ Samurai
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice (Great ATK Up & All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Deadly Mastery (Crit Rate Up)/ Blade Soul (ATK/Evasion Rate Up & DEF down)
Reaction: Counter Slash (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Engelbert
Short Character Overview(WIP): Engelbert is one of the best Tanks, he can reach 100+ defence leading to Physical attacks dealing 1 damage to him and can increase Hate forcing enemys to attack him. Additionally he can use the Knight sub to grant several debuffs to the enemy.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: HP up Lv.1
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Xiza
Short Character Overview(WIP): Xiza is very fast and highly mobile. She has the ability to Charm enemies as well as some option for ranged attacks and revive. She also has Steal time to  reduce CT of raid/hard bosses, very useful for chain building. Her Trust Mastery Reward is one of the best. It has AP auto-restore skill and 7 agility, all the much needed and rare skills/stats on gear.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Monk
Support 1: Strike Mastery (Strike Atk Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Fist Counter (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical damage)

Name: Thancred
Short Character Overview(WIP): Thancred is a Bruiser, being able to tank while dealing good amounts of damage, he has some potential do deal ranged damage as well as supporting, especially Tanks, increasing def and granting health regen to other allies
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunbreaker
Support 1: Initial AP Up Lv.1
Support 2: HP Up lv.1
Reaction: Jagular Rip (Chance of Counterattack when taking damage)

Name: Shimur
Short Character Overview(WIP): Shimur is a damage type character. With access to Thief he gets good mobility and can reduce the enemys CT, which makes him viable for Raid and Boss battles.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/ Atk Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Quick Action (Chance of significantly raising own Agility for 1 turn after taking damage)

Name: Dario
Short Character Overview(WIP): Dario is a Tank, his Ninja passiv gives him good mobility. His high movement allows him to efficiently take the enemys aggro and his magic damage gives him some advantage against physical tanks and enemys with low magic resistance.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin/ Spellblade
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Reaction: Paladin's Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Tirel
Short Character Overview(WIP): Tirel as a Bruiser, can take some hits, while dealing some damage. Access to a ranged attacks and several debuffs make her fairly usable.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Viking
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/ Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of Damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Salire
Short Character Overview(WIP): Salire is basically the MR version of Mediena, her MA allows her to reach high Mag. She can cast Thunder and none element magic with Blackmage and thanks to White Mage she gets the really powerful light magic attack Holy. The Ninja passive gives her good mobility. Overall one of the best MR Units.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage/ White Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Adelard
Short Character Overview(WIP): Adelard got high Mag thanks to his MA. He can be a magic damage dealer while also perfoming well as support with heals and several buffs, also he got high initial AP buffing him for extented battles.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage/ White Mage
Support 1: Initial AP Up Lv.1 
Support 2: Mage's Protection (Increase Magic ATK Res)
Reaction: Regenerator (Chance of bestowing Regen on self for 3 turns when taking damage)

Name: Dorando
Short Character Overview(WIP): He can slash short-range enemies and shoot long-range enemies. "Drain Cyclone" is a range attack that absorbs damage done, and is a powerful ability that can make use of his higher HP. He can increase his team's fire attack power, range, and crit chance with the Gunner abilities "Advise" and "Aim". Weak point is that he is slow and has a low # of turns. He needs haste support
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunner
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1 
Reaction: Counter Shot (Chance of countertattack when taking damage)

Name: Gaffgarion
Short Character Overview(WIP): A powerful physical attacker that learns attack up abilities( "Sacrifice" and "Attack Up Lv1") He has good range on `` Evil Blade '' and `` Evil Dead '', which can deal a lot of damage, and  `` Sword of Darkness '', which recovers HP by the amount of damage that has been dealt. Gafgarion has a lot of abilities to consume and use HP, so there is concern about survival.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Dark Knight
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Atk Up Lv.1
Reaction: Old Mercenary (Chance of counterattack when taking damage and absorbing the damage done)

Name: Etoa
Short Character Overview(WIP): Etoa perfoms as a bruiser with good mobility. Her damage is limited, but shes good for Chains. Her Sub Jobs give her some Utility and her TMR work very well on many kinds of Units.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Monk
Support 1: Strike Mastery (Strike Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Fist Counter (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical damage)

Name: Nasha
Short Character Overview(WIP): Nasha is a really sturdy Tank with High HP value. she can make use of her White mage sub, but remember to make her heals/ressurection more reliable you need high faith, which makes her more vurnable to Magic damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: HP up Lv.1
Reaction: Paladin's Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Shadowlynx
Short Character Overview(WIP): Shadowlynx is one the most mobile Units in this game. She can reach 6 move and 6 Jump roaming around the map without effort. She got decently high atk, can stop the enemy and increas the Evade of herself and allies. Shes very squishy and only her high Evade gives her some fake tankyness. Shes also good for Chains.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai/ Ninja
Support 1: Shadow Runner (Agi/Luck Up)
Support 2: Blade Soul (Atk/Evasion UP, DEF Down)
Reaction: Third Eye (Chance of raising own Evasion Rate for 3 turns when taking Damage (stackable up to 3 times))

Name: Mont Leonis
Short Character Overview(WIP): Mont is the go to Tank for everyone, he can reach high HP stats and even deal some decent damage. Hes really easy and cheap to max out, cuz his shards are available for Gil is the Shop. His Knight Sub gives him access to some debuffs, but his Paladin sub is usally recommended further increasing his Tank status.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Crown Prince of Leonis (Atk Up)
Reaction: Counter Blade (Chance of Counterattack when taking physical Damage)

Name: Y'Shtola
Short Character Overview(WIP): Y'shtola is a fairly usable Free Unit, shes easy to max out and can be a decent farmer thanks to her diamond aoe. She can deal some good damage but suffers from REALLY bad Tankyness and movement. She can use White mage sub for some healing or Greenmage for some other buffs.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Sorceress/ White Mage
Support 1: Enochian (Mag Up)
Support 2: Savior's Protection (Debuff Res/ Magic ATK Res Up)
Reaction: Manafont (Chance of recovering own AP when taking Damage)

Name: Owe
Short Character Overview(WIP): Owe is a decent Physical Attacker. He can increase you partys Bravery and Evasion, and got some ranged damage with Hien. Ninja Sub further increases his ranged damage potential and increases his mobility. He naturally really squishy.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ninja
Support 1: Blade Soul (Atk/Evasion Up, DEF down)
Support 2: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Reaction: Third Eye (Chance of raising own Evasion Rate for 3 turns when taking Damage (Stackable up to 3 times)

Name: Marguerite
Short Character Overview(WIP): Marguerite is a Support, she can Cast several buffs like Haste and Quicken and debuff the enemy with debuffs like Slow. She got low Movement.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage/ Red Mage
Support 1: Magic Up Lv.1
Support 2: Initial AP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Slow Counter (Chance of inflicting Slow on target for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: "Grace"
Short Character Overview(WIP): is the best MR healer so far and thats also all she does, healing her allies, she got some minor buffs with Shell and Protest which usally arent advised to level for Auto play purpose.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Support 1: Emerald Echo (Increase effect duration of Buff/Debuff cast by self by 1 turn)
Support 2: Savior's Protection (Debuff Res/ Magic ATK Res Up)
Reaction: Regenerator (Chance of bestowing Regen on self for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Cadia
Short Character Overview(WIP): Cadia is mostly a support type, casting some buffs and heals for her allies. She got medium damage potential wth Spellblade sub.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Support 1: Spirit Up Lv.1 
Support 2: Providence of Earth (Earth Res/ Magic ATK Res Up)
Reaction: Regenerator (Chance of bestowing Regen on self for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Ramada
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ramada can work well in the beginning of the game thanks to early access to the skill 'Nighthawk'. Her Ma gives her some decent Tankyness and Thief as Sub Job gives her access to move+1 and some extra AGI.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer
Support 1: Pierce Mastery ( Pierce ATK Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore ( Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Counter Thrust (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage & Piercing)

Name: Vistralle
Short Character Overview(WIP): Vistralle is purely a Thief, his Sub jobs doesnt really benefit him a lot. Thiefs CT reduce and Charm skills are very strong. He needs high faith to land his important debuffs so hes very vurnable to all types of damage and his good Evasion is his only kind of survivability.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: Self Sacrifice ( Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Counter Slash (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Khury Wezette
Short Character Overview(WIP): Khury as a main Ranger can make use of his high range to avoid direct combat with enemys. Compared to other Rangers hes far less mobile and slow. He can make some good use of his Dragoon Sub.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Dragoon
Support 1: Focus (Cast time Down, Missile Atk Up)
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Schuzelt
Short Character Overview(WIP): Schuzelt is the MR Unit with the Highest ATK. His Hazard Form skill gives him a great boost in damage and acces to Ranger sub gives him the potential to kill the enemys out of save distance.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice ( Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Fina
Short Character Overview(WIP): Fina is the only Unit yet released in Global that can increase faith and only for this shes fairly usable. She can support your allies with heals and buffs and deal some minor damage with Gunner Sub.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage of Lapis
Support 1: Innocent Shooter (Range +1, Magic Up)
Support 2: Secret of Shooting (Missle Atk Up)
Reaction: Counter Shot (Chance of counterattack when taking damage)

Name: Helena Leonis
Short Character Overview(WIP): Helena got a good Job combination allowing her to serve well in all kinds of situations. She can support her allies with many kind of buffs and heals and thanks to high Mag she can even deal some reasonable damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Emerald Echo (Increase effect duration of Buff/Debuff cast by self by 1 turn)
Support 2: Speed Cast (Cast Time Down)
Reaction: Slow Counter (Chance of inflicting Slow on target for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Meriluke
Short Character Overview(WIP): Meriluke can thanks to monk easily generate Chains and with knight sub cast some debuffs on the enemy. Shes also kinda Tanky.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Monk
Support 1: Strike Mastery (Strike Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Fist Counter (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical damage)

Name: Rairyuu
Short Character Overview(WIP): Rairyuu is good Unit for new Player. His high range makes him really easy to use. Also his Gunner Job gives him some nice buffs for his allies and debuffs for the enemys.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunner
Support 1: Secret of Shooting (Missile Atk Up)
Support 2: Concentration (Range +2, Evasion Down)
Reaction: Quick Action (Chance of significantly raising own Agility for 1 turn after taking damage)

Name: Lilyth
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lilyth is fairly simular to Schuzelt with less atk, she makes use of her Ranger sub for some long range attacks and got some debuffs with her Knight main.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice ( Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Lorenzo
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lorenzo is a bruiser type, he gets fairly tanky, he can use Jump attack with his Dragoon job, or get some medium range attacks with Lancer as sub. He could use Time mage as Sub to support his allies with Haste and quicken, but with his usally low faith its not recommended.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer
Support 1: Pierce Mastery ( Pierce ATK Up)
Support 2: Deadly Mastery (Crit Rate Up)
Reaction: Dragon's Blade (Chance of Counterattack when taking Damage & absorbs Damage dealt)

Name: Phoebe
Short Character Overview(WIP): Best SR Unit in game, even better then some MR Unit. Very good mobility and speed for a support. Has Haste and Quick and Healing spell. Good at manipulating turn of Allies and Enemy. Extremely good TMR for a SR. Highly recommended for raising.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Speed Cast (Cast Time Down)
Support 2: Jump +1 / HP Up LV.1
Reaction: Slow Counter (Chance of inflicting Slow on target for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Little Leela
Short Character Overview(WIP): Spellblade are debuffers. Somewhat tanky, especially against magic and can use Taunting spell for Hate up. Can also use Heal/Recovery from White Mage sub.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Spellblade
Support 1: Providence of Light (Magic ATK Res/ Light Res Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Sworld Guard (Chance of Damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: "Murmur"
Short Character Overview(WIP): Poor Man's Kilufe: a tanky Earth magic damage dealer. Jamming Thrust and Fast Cast are best skills of Red mage. Can ditch out some good damage and also have decent recovery and debuff skills.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage
Support 1: Mag Up Lv.1
Support 2:Initial AP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Baelo
Short Character Overview(WIP): Poor Man's Engelbert. He is a worse tank than Mont is everyway with the same element. So not sure if there is any reason to raise him. Don't think there is a content that requires 2 Earth tanks, but only then he might be useful (still questionable). He has some decent breaks from his Knight job, especial "Trinity break" and that's it.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: HP up Lv.1
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Socia
Short Character Overview(WIP): With Jump 4, he can reach high ground and use his Ranger skills to Attack enemy from afar. His jumping from main job also have some nice damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Atk Up Lv.1
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Vallaide
Short Character Overview(WIP): Good support, have +45% TP in MA so can cast support/debuff skills for days. Can cast "Fast cast" on ally to increase the overall damage of a Magic caster focused team.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage
Support 1: Initial AP Up Lv.1
Support 2: Emerald Echo (Increase effect duration of Buff/Debuff cast by self by 1 turn)
Reaction: Regenerator (Chance of bestowing Regen on self for 3 turns when taking damage)

Name: Surjes
Short Character Overview(WIP): Can use Paladin sub for emergency tanking, though the low stats are not very desireable for taking damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Pierce Mastery (Pierce Atk Up)
Reaction: Counter Thrust (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage, Piercing)

Name: Vadim
Short Character Overview(WIP): Can use as item collector with steal from the start. Can be somewhat of a evasion character with the MA and Samurai/Thief passives. Can deal some damage with Samurai sub class and buff evasion for the team. Learn Mug later on, useful for auto-steal in Auto-Battles.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai
Support 1: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Support 2: Acquired AP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Third Eye (Chance of raising Evasion Rate for 3 turns when taking Damage (Stackable up to 3 times))

Name: Yuni
Master Ability Effect:
HP +30%, 
Slash, Pierce, Strike, Missile ATK Resistance +10
Short Character Overview(WIP): A tanky Ranger. Which is weird as Ranger want to stand far away so that they don't take damage to begin with. Low Stats.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Focus (Cast Time Down, Missile Atk Up) 
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Naiah
Short Character Overview(WIP): One of the most useful SR. She can serve as a good Healer/support. Red Mage sub brings some good Damage skills and Status debuff.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage
Support 1: Initial AP Up Lv.1
Support 2: Spirit Up Lv.1
Reaction: Regenerator (Chance of bestowing Regen on self for 3 turns when taking damage)

Name: Severo
Short Character Overview(WIP): Water mage is rather hard to come by. Can be useful if you really need a Water magic damage dealer. Can use Red mage sub for some healing and damaging spells. MA give some nice resistance to compensate for low stats.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage/ Black Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Initial AP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Learte
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ranger with good accuracy. Can use White Mage sub for some healing and status recovery. Still, very bad stats, raise for the meme.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Focus (Cast Time Down, Missile Atk Up) 
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Miche
Short Character Overview(WIP): Magic cast time is very short, almost instant. Have Plant Killer +50 from MA, other than that, very bad stats.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Mia
Short Character Overview(WIP): Mia can be used as an item collector immediately, because you can use "steal" in her initial state. Since her initial "Jump" is at 3, it is also attractive that it is strong against height differences. Subjob " Magic Swordsman " can use debuffs such as bio swords and chicken swords. She has weak stats, but can support allies as a debuffer.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: Acquired AP Up Lv.1
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Quick Action (Chance of significantly raising own Agility for 1 turn after taking damage)

Name: Zazan
Short Character Overview(WIP): Zazan can reach max Move of 6, highest in game, very mobile. You can Equip 'Vow of Love" so that he can become a Wall for some damage or debuff absorbing. Zazan's fragments can be obtained from "Normal Summon", "Shop". Easier to limitbreak then any other Character. His TMR have high defense, most character can equip it, aim for that TMR if you have enough materials.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: Acquired AP Up Lv.1
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Quick Action (Chance of significantly raising own Agility for 1 turn after taking damage)
